```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())

culture_wars <- read_csv("2025_42/pew_culture_wars_2024.csv") |> clean_names()
culture_wars
```

```{r}
ggplot(culture_wars, aes(y = issue)) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = biden_supporters_percent, xend = trump_supporters_percent, y = issue, yend = issue)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = biden_supporters_percent),  color = "blue3", size = 6) +
  geom_point(aes(x = trump_supporters_percent), color = "red3", size = 6) +
  labs(
    title = "repuplicans vs democrats on culture issues"
  ) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 30, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 20),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )
```
